Name: Find The Murderer 3
About the game: A young man has disappeared from one apartment. Detective Silantyev begins to investigate the case. The genre of the game is a walking simulator with a third-person or first-person view (you can switch with the mouse wheel). You will need to complete various tasks to solve mystery of his disappearance. There are funny moments in the game. It will be possible to explore area, communicate with various characters, watch interesting cut scenes. There will be several locations in the game. Game controls: WASD - move E - activate Space bar - jump C - crouch F - call horse Left Shift - walk/run Mouse wheel - zoom Tab - show/hide task
